A

AbstractRunMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo
Abstract base class for mojos that implement the run goal for plug-ins that use the Monitor framework.
AbstractRunMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractRunMojo
 
AbstractServer - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
Abstract base class for objects that implement the Server interface.
AbstractServer() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
 
AbstractServerMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo
Abstract base class for mojos that implement the stop and run goals for plug-ins that use the Monitor framework.
AbstractServerMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
 
AbstractStopMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo
Implements the stop goal for plug-ins that use the Monitor framework.
AbstractStopMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractStopMojo
 

C

com.btmatthews.utils.monitor - package com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This package contains the classes that implement a simple monitor for controlling server processes.
com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo - package com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo
This package contains the classes that implement a abstract base classes for Mojos that utilise the Monitor framework.
configure(String, Object, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
Invoked by the monitor to configure a server property.
configure(String, Object, Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
Configure the a server property.
createMonitor() - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
Create the monitor object tha is used to control a server.
createServer() - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.ServerFactory
Create a server object.

E

execute() - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractRunMojo
Execute the Maven goal by creating a the server, configuring it and then running it with the monitor.
execute() - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractStopMojo
Stop a running an embedded server by sending a stop command to the monitor that is controlling that server.

Get the server name.
getServerType() - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractRunMojo

M

Monitor - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
The monitor object is used to control a server.
Monitor(String, int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
The constructor that initialises the monitor key and port.
Monitor(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
The constructor that initialises the monitor key and port.
MonitorObserver - Interface in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
Implemented by objects that want to receive notifications from the monitor when a server has started or stopped.

R

runMonitor(Server, Logger, MonitorObserver) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
Run the monitor listening for commands and sending them to the server.
runMonitorDaemon(Server, Logger, MonitorObserver) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
Spawn a thread used to run the monitor as daemon processes.

S

sendCommand(String, int, String, Logger) - Static method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
Static method used to send a command to a server via a monitor.
sendCommand(String, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
Send a command to the monitor.
Server - Interface in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This interface is implemented by server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
ServerFactory - Interface in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This interface is implemented by factories that create server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
ServerFactoryLocator - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This locator object is a singleton that is used to obtain the factory that will be used to create server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
ServerFactoryLocator(Logger, ClassLoader) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.ServerFactoryLocator
The constructor that scans the classpath and registers all available factory objects.
start(Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
Invoked by the monitor to launch the server.
start(Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
Start the server.
started(Server, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractRunMojo
This callback is called after the server has started.
started(Server, Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.MonitorObserver
This callback is called after the server has started.
stop(Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
Invoked by the monitor to halt the server.
stop(Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
Stop the server.
stopped(Server, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractRunMojo
This callback is called after the server has exited.
stopped(Server, Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.MonitorObserver
This callback is called after the server has exited.
